mav_sim.message_types.msg_state module¶

msgState: messages type for state, that will be passed between blocks in the architecture.

part of mavPySim

  • Beard & McLain, PUP, 2012

  • Update history:

    1/9/2019 - RWB 12/21 - GND

class mav_sim.message_types.msg_state.MsgState(north: float = 0.0, east: float = 0.0, altitude: float = 0.0, phi: float = 0.0, theta: float = 0.0, psi: float = 0.0, Va: float = 0.0, alpha: float = 0.0, beta: float = 0.0, p: float = 0.0, q: float = 0.0, r: float = 0.0, Vg: float = 0.0, gamma: float = 0.0, chi: float = 0.0, wn: float = 0.0, we: float = 0.0, bx: float = 0.0, by: float = 0.0, bz: float = 0.0)¶
